useCase.name: Tagging Process
useCase.description: User initiates a tagging process through the Web Interface to assign controlled vocabulary tags to a dataset/file.

preconditions.precondition: The user has permissions to access the tagging system through the Web Interface.

mainSequence.step: Tagging System queries Controlled Vocabulary DB for tags
Controlled Vocabulary DB returns vocabulary list to Tagging System
Tagging System displays available vocabulary tags in Web Interface
User selects tags from controlled vocabulary list
Web Interface assigns selected tags to dataset/file
Tagging System validates and saves assigned tags
Controlled Vocabulary DB confirms tag assignment
Tagging System confirms successful tagging to the user
Web Interface displays tagging success message to the user
